description:
TekStream has an immediate opening for a Data Engineer with a strong background in Python, AWS and Databricks for a remote long term contract. Applicants able to work on W2 basis preferred.

What we're looking for...

A highly analytical-minded individual and play an integral part of our data-driven organization. The ideal candidate will leverage their expertise in Python, Databricks, and AWS to develop and optimize data pipelines, conduct complex analyses, and contribute to the overall success of our analytics initiatives.
• Strong proficiency in Python for data manipulation and analysis
• Experience with Databricks for data engineering and analytics
• Experience with additional cloud platforms (AWS)
• Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git)
• Knowledge of integration development
• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
• Knowledge of big data technologies such as Apache Spark
• Familiarity with data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI)
